version_description:
New Features!

- Shuffle and Repeat have been added to the Now Playing screen.

- Scrolling to the bottom of the All mixtapes tab will continue to load page after page.

- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We have more new features in the works but these were added first based on user reviews. If you enjoy the app please give us a 5 star rating and review we read them all!

New Features!

- Shuffle and Repeat have been added to the Now Playing screen.

- Scrolling to the bottom of the All mixtapes tab will continue to load page after page.

- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We have more new features in the works but these were added first based on user reviews. If you enjoy the app please give us a 5 star rating and review we read them all!

New Features and Performance Enhancements!

* Support for exclusive In-App early mixtapes releases
* Swap in between all LMT properties including Indytapes & Clubtapes
* Now you're able to search all of your Favorites, Downloads & Playlists
* Search improvements & pagination
* Bug Fixes

#GetItLIVE!

New Features and Performance Enhancements!

* Support for exclusive In-App early mixtapes releases
* Swap in between all LMT properties including Indytapes & Clubtapes
* Now you're able to search all of your Favorites, Downloads & Playlists
* Search improvements & pagination
* Bug Fixes

#GetItLIVE!

*Crash fix on iOS 7
*Internal improvements and minor bug fixes

*Crash fix on iOS 7
*Internal improvements and minor bug fixes

Fixed error handling when in offline / airplane mode.

#GetItLIVE!

Fixed error handling when in offline / airplane mode.

#GetItLIVE!

Fixed issues with previously downloaded mixtapes.

Other recent updates include:
- Clubtapes, Indytapes properties added to main screen.
- Search pagination and improvements.
- Mini search for playlists, downloads and favorites
- In-app exclusive release support
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

#GetItLIVE!

All new features for 2.0!

· Re-sync from cloud and never lose your downloads again
· "Play All" feature for downloads
· Improved offline support
· Add your own custom cover / fan art to mixtapes
· Track leak support on unreleased mixtapes
· Deep linking for mixtapes and playlists.
· Playlist sharing
· Added features for track sharing
· "Top Tracks" section added
· "Related Mixtapes" added on mixtape screen
· General bug fixes and performance enhancements

More coming soon we appreciate any and all feedback! #GetItLIVE!

Bug fix and performance update #GetItLIVE!

NEW! LMT Radio is now ready to use on the Now Playing screen!

Also, bug fixes and performance updates #GetItLIVE!
Podcast support! Along with our original podcast "Bin Had That". Find our podcast and others on the news tab. #GetItLIVE!

Great new features and improvements! Now you can actively manage your Now Playing queue. This means you can add and remove tracks as you navigate through the app while music plays continuously. You can jump between LMT Radio, your playlists, top tracks or any music in the app seamlessly. Enjoy and #GetItLIVE!
